name: Helix Jump 2: Flexi Hoops
description:
Tap to jump up and try to go as high as you can. Beware of the Flexi Hoops...'Cause they always be elasticity. Can you get through those Flexi Hoops easily?
Dont forget the Leader Board, let's be proud to be the one on top !

***Special updates:
- Racing mode: try your best to go faster than your enemy and win the race
- Crashing mode: get rid of your enemy by hitting them out of your way
